nodes.text: The Chieftain's hut was located in the Talz village on Orto Plutonia. As the villages main hut, it served as the place for negotiation between the Talz villagers and the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker when they were investigating an attack on a Republic base. Like all Talz huts, it was made out of animal skin stretched over bones.
